Whenever a player casts a spell, remove a +1/+1 counter from this creature. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

name: Jungle Wayfinder
rulesTexts: When this creature enters, each player may search their library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into their hand, then shuffle.

name: Together Forever
rulesTexts:
When this enchantment enters, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.)
{1}: Choose target creature with a counter on it. When that creature dies this turn, return that card to its owner's hand.

name: Stolen Strategy
rulesTexts: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of each opponent's library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among those exiled cards, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.

name: Game Plan
rulesTexts:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {5} of this spell's cost.)
Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. Exile Game Plan.

name: Call to Heel
rulesTexts: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Its controller draws a card.

name: Will Kenrith
rulesTexts:
+2: Until your next turn, up to two target creatures each have base power and toughness 0/3 and lose all abilities.
−2: Target player draws two cards. Until your next turn, instant, sorcery, and planeswalker spells that player casts cost {2} less to cast.
−8: Target player gets an emblem with "Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy."
Partner with Rowan Kenrith
Will Kenrith can be your commander.

name: Wrap in Flames
rulesTexts: Wrap in Flames deals 1 damage to each of up to three target creatures. Those creatures can't block this turn.

name: Fertile Ground
rulesTexts:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

name: Swarm of Bloodflies
rulesTexts:
Flying
This creature enters with two +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

name: Archon of Valor's Reach
rulesTexts:
Flying, vigilance, trample
As this creature enters, choose artifact, enchantment, instant, sorcery, or planeswalker.
Players can't cast spells of the chosen type.

name: Pulse of Murasa
rulesTexts: Return target creature or land card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. You gain 6 life.

name: Silverchase Fox
rulesTexts: {1}{W}, Sacrifice this creature: Exile target enchantment.

name: Shock
rulesTexts: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

name: Chain Lightning
rulesTexts: Chain Lightning deals 3 damage to any target. Then that player or that permanent's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, they may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

name: Gold-Forged Sentinel
rulesTexts: Flying

name: Bramble Sovereign
rulesTexts: Whenever another nontoken creature enters, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, that creature's controller creates a token that's a copy of that creature.

name: Jubilant Mascot
rulesTexts: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {3}{W}. If you do, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)

name: Steppe Glider
rulesTexts:
Flying, vigilance
{1}{W}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains flying and vigilance until end of turn.

name: Riptide Crab
rulesTexts:
Vigilance
When this creature dies, draw a card.

name: Reckless Reveler
rulesTexts: {R}, Sacrifice this creature: Destroy target artifact.

name: Assassin's Strike
rulesTexts: Destroy target creature. Its controller discards a card.

name: Flamewave Invoker
rulesTexts: {7}{R}: This creature deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

name: Vampire Charmseeker
rulesTexts:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {6} of this spell's cost.)
Flying
When this creature enters, return target instant, sorcery, or creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand.

name: Royal Trooper
rulesTexts: Whenever this creature blocks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Hand of Silumgar
rulesTexts: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

name: Okaun, Eye of Chaos
rulesTexts:
Partner with Zndrsplt, Eye of Wisdom (When this creature enters, target player may put Zndrsplt into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
At the beginning of combat on your turn, flip a coin until you lose a flip.
Whenever a player wins a coin flip, double Okaun's power and toughness until end of turn.

name: Goblin Razerunners
rulesTexts:
{1}{R}, Sacrifice a land: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
At the beginning of your end step, you may have this creature deal damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to target player or planeswalker.

name: Combo Attack
rulesTexts: Two target creatures your team controls each deal damage equal to their power to target creature.

name: Impetuous Protege
rulesTexts:
Partner with Proud Mentor (When this creature enters, target player may put Proud Mentor into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the greatest power among tapped creatures your opponents control.

name: Angelic Chorus
rulesTexts: Whenever a creature you control enters, you gain life equal to its toughness.

name: Gwafa Hazid, Profiteer
rulesTexts:
{W}{U}, {T}: Put a bribery counter on target creature you don't control. Its controller draws a card.
Creatures with bribery counters on them can't attack or block.

name: Azra Bladeseeker
rulesTexts: When this creature enters, each player on your team may discard a card, then each player who discarded a card this way draws a card.

name: Battle Rampart
rulesTexts:
Defender
{T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

name: Inner Demon
rulesTexts:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has flying, and is a Demon in addition to its other types.
When this Aura enters, all non-Demon creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

name: Veteran Explorer
rulesTexts: When this creature dies, each player may search their library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

name: Painful Lesson
rulesTexts: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

name: Loyal Pegasus
rulesTexts:
Flying
This creature can't attack or block alone.

name: Bring Down
rulesTexts:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {3} of this spell's cost.)
Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

name: Bonus Round
rulesTexts: Until end of turn, whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, that player copies it and may choose new targets for the copy.

name: Solemn Offering
rulesTexts: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.

name: Fill with Fright
rulesTexts: Target player discards two cards. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Nirkana Revenant
rulesTexts:
Whenever you tap a Swamp for mana, add an additional {B}.
{B}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Take Up Arms
rulesTexts: Create three 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens.

name: Greater Good
rulesTexts: Sacrifice a creature: Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then discard three cards.

name: Centaur Healer
rulesTexts: When this creature enters, you gain 3 life.

name: Magmatic Force
rulesTexts: At the beginning of each upkeep, this creature deals 3 damage to any target.

name: Vigor
rulesTexts:
Trample
If damage would be dealt to another creature you control, prevent that damage. Put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way.
When Vigor is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

name: Toothy, Imaginary Friend
rulesTexts:
Partner with Pir, Imaginative Rascal (When this creature enters, target player may put Pir into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Toothy.
When Toothy leaves the battlefield, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Juggernaut
rulesTexts:
This creature attacks each combat if able.
This creature can't be blocked by Walls.

name: Magma Hellion
rulesTexts:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {6} of this spell's cost.)
Trample, haste

name: Bull-Rush Bruiser
rulesTexts: Whenever this creature attacks, if your team controls another Warrior, this creature gains first strike until end of turn.

name: Charging Rhino
rulesTexts: This creature can't be blocked by more than one creature.

name: Shoulder to Shoulder
rulesTexts:
Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.)
Draw a card.

name: Lore Weaver
rulesTexts:
Partner with Ley Weaver (When this creature enters, target player may put Ley Weaver into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
{5}{U}{U}: Target player draws two cards.

name: Magus of the Candelabra
rulesTexts: {X}, {T}: Untap X target lands.

name: Mystic Confluence
rulesTexts:
Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
• Return target creature to its owner's hand.
• Draw a card.

name: Rushblade Commander
rulesTexts: Warriors your team controls have haste.

name: Aim High
rulesTexts: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 and gains reach until end of turn.

name: Nimbus of the Isles
rulesTexts: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

name: Negate
rulesTexts: Counter target noncreature spell.

name: Liturgy of Blood
rulesTexts: Destroy target creature. Add {B}{B}{B}.

name: Peregrine Drake
rulesTexts:
Flying
When this creature enters, untap up to five lands.
